name: Calaverita
description:
Inspired in the rich Mexican culture of el Día de Muertos I participated in my first game jam where I made my first game!

Calaverita is when all the kids go around the neighborhood singing traditional songs and asking for their calaverita which is normally candy but originally it was fruit.

Being my very first game some parts are a little rough but as part of the devtober 2020 one of my goals was to make at least $1 from my first game. So feel free to donate and support my journey as a future game developer. I've uploaded the game in every format as well the sprite sheet.

Credits to my brother David for designing all the sprites!
